My Projects

Take a look at some of my projects

Project GitHub

RATL is a MERN Stack application that is geared to simplify job searching. With its easy to navigate UI, users are able to search for jobs in any given area, archive a posting of a job, post job connections if applicable, and set reminders on their calendars so that no important events don't go unattended.

Project GitHub

Guardian is a Full Stack application intended for secretary use. It allows the user to take in an animal, mark it ready for ready for adoption, and display all of the animals that are available to adopt.

Project GitHub

NotStarbucks, an application built for anyone who enjoys visiting non-chain coffee shops. By using Google's GeoLocation API, a user is asked to input an area code of their choosing, or simply turn on their location and 10 different coffee shops that aren't StarBucks will appear.

Project GitHub
